medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to identify the function of the message and to transmit its identification number.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the default currency used to express the monetary amounts contained in the whole message.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A segment group identifying and providing details relating to parties at message level, such as message sender and receiver, declarant and signatory.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment providing the names and identifier of the parties involved in the transmission of the message or in a transaction associated to the message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment providing additional references related to the parties.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to indicate attributes of the parties.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to specify addresses related to the parties.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to indicate communication numbers relevant to the described parties.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A segment group to identify supporting documents at message and declaration level.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying and providing information relating to the documents.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to provide additional references related to the documents.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate dates related to the documents.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to specify attributes of the documents.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to provide addresses associated with the documents such as a postal address.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to describe locations associated with the documents such as place of signature or place of delivery.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to provide communication numbers related to the documents, such as the one used to transmit a document via a specified channel.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment to specify an indicator related to the processing of the documents.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide additional free text information concerning the documents.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A segment group to specify details about the payment related to the cost of a formality, such as registration fees.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate the paid amount.

medi:segment.name: Payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, A segment to detail instructions for the payment, such as payment means.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment to identify an account and the related financial institution relevant for the payment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to provide dates related to the payment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A segment group to identify and describe the events reported in the message. This group may provide a summary of the events described in details in the rest of the message.

medi:segment.name: Event
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EVE, A segment to identify the event reported in the message.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to indicate attributes associated with the events.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates related to the events.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide free text information related to the events.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A segment group to provide information on relevant entities belonging to an enterprise to which events apply. An entity designates a component of the structure of an enterprise such as its legal entity, a branch or an agency. This group may describe entities referring to different enterprises when events affect them all together.

medi:segment.name: Data set identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DSI, A segment to identify a data set referring to an entity within an enterprise.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to provide the names and identifier of the parties associated with the entity of the enterprise currently described.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, A segment to indicate the relationship between the entity currently described and others previously provided.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to provide references related to the entity described such as a unique identifier of the entity which is in relation with it.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A segment group to identify and provide information related to events applying to the entity of the enterprise.

medi:segment.name: Event
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EVE, A segment to identify events applying to the entity of the enterprise.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to provide attributes associated with the events.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate dates associated with the events.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide free text information related to the events.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: FTX-SG8-SG9-SG10-SG11-SG12-SG13 A segment group to provide detailed information related to the events applying to the described entity of the enterprise.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, A segment to identify the relationship between data contained in this group.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to provide the names and the identifier of a related party.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to indicate references associated with the information described in the group, such as additional reference numbers of a related party.

medi:segment.name: Nationality
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAT, A segment to provide the nationality of a related party.

medi:segment.name: Person demographic information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PDI, A segment to indicate the marital status of a related party.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to provide dates associated with event-related information described in the group, such as the related party date of birth or accounting dates.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to provide addresses associated with the event- related information described in the group.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to provide locations associated with the event- related information described in the group, such as the place of birth of a related party or the operating place of an enterprise.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to provide communication numbers associated with the event-related information described in the group.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to provide quantities associated with the event- related information described in the group, such as a number of employees.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide additional free text information concerning the event-related information described in the group.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A segment group to provide relevant attributes applying to the event-related information described in the group, such as a business activity characteristic.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to identify attributes associated with the event-related information described in the group.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment to specify a processing indicator associated with the described attribute.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to provide dates associated with the described attribute.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify a measurement applicable to the described attribute.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide additional free text information concerning the described attribute.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A segment group to provide details on relevant monetary amounts associated with the event-related information described in the group, such as capital amount or share holding amount.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to provide details on a monetary amount associated with the event-related information described in the group.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to specify relevant attributes applicable to the provided monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate dates associated with the provided monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate relevant quantities associated with the provided monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify any additional free text information associated with the provided monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A segment group to provide details on documents associated with the event-related information described in the group, such as: - supporting document, - written proof, - specific authorization.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to identify the related documents.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to specify attributes applicable to the related documents.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to provide locations associated with the related documents.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate dates applicable to the related documents.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A segment group to provide tax related information.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment to identify and describe the tax information.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to provide any tax related attribute such as a tax system characteristic or a periodicity of payment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to provide any tax related locations.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide any tax related free text information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A segment group to provide employment related information.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment to identify the employment type and category.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to provide employment related attributes.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to provide employment related locations.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to provide employment related dates.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A segment group to provide insurance coverage related information.

medi:segment.name: Insurance cover description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ICD, A segment to identify and describe the related insurance coverage.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A segment group to identify and describe parties involved in the insurance coverage, such as an health insurance organization or a pension scheme.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to provide names and identifier of a party involved in the insurance coverage.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to provide addresses related to the party involved in the insurance coverage.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to provide locations related to the party involved in the insurance coverage.
